movies.title: Inception

movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

movies.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team travels through a wormhole in space.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek Hobbit sets out to destroy a powerful ring.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.description: The fellowship is broken but continues its quest.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: The final confrontation for Middle-earth.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.description: Luke Skywalker joins the Rebel Alliance.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.description: The Rebels are pursued by the Empire.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
movies.description: The Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over years.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.description: Two magicians engage in a rivalry.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General seeks revenge.

movies.title: Memento
movies.description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of an imprisoned cannibal.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: A group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland, Oskar Schindler becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened by a new spaceman figure.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey.

movies.title: Up
movies.description: 78-year-old Carl sets out to fulfill his dream to see the wilds of South America.

movies.title: WALL·E
movies.description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey.

movies.title: Coco
movies.description: Aspiring musician Miguel enters the Land of the Dead.

movies.title: Inside Out
movies.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life, her emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city.

movies.title: Monsters, Inc.
movies.description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker.

movies.title: The Incredibles
movies.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.description: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.

movies.title: Princess Mononoke
movies.description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war.

movies.title: My Neighbor Totoro
movies.description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits.

movies.title: Grave of the Fireflies
movies.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

movies.title: Akira
movies.description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo.

movies.title: Your Name.
movies.description: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: Oldboy
movies.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

movies.title: Memories of Murder
movies.description: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered.

movies.title: The Handmaiden
movies.description: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

movies.title: City of God
movies.description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

movies.title: Amélie
movies.description: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice.

movies.title: The Intouchables
movies.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.description: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

movies.title: Life Is Beautiful
movies.description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son.

movies.title: Cinema Paradiso
movies.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village.

movies.title: The Lives of Others
movies.description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

movies.title: Downfall
movies.description: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

movies.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
movies.description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure.

movies.title: Hero
movies.description: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.

movies.title: The Pianist
movies.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.title: Amadeus
movies.description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri.

movies.title: The Great Dictator
movies.description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution.

movies.title: Modern Times
movies.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

movies.title: City Lights
movies.description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

movies.title: The Kid
movies.description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

movies.title: The Gold Rush
movies.description: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.
